title: Color
description: Find the perfect color palette for your design projects. Explore color generators, palette tools, gradient makers, and accessibility checkers. Create beautiful color schemes with tools like Coolors, Adobe Color, Color Hunt, and more.

resources.title: Adobe Color
resources.description: Professional color wheel tool from Adobe for creating harmonious color schemes. Extract colors from images, explore trending palettes, and test accessibility ratios.

resources.title: BrandColors
resources.description: The biggest collection of official brand color codes around.

resources.title: Branition Colors
resources.description: Hand-curated collection of color palettes best fitted for branding.

resources.title: Color Claim
resources.description: Color Claim was created in 2012 by Tobias van Schneider with the goal to collect & combine unique colors for your future projects.

resources.title: Color Hunt
resources.description: Color Hunt is a free and open platform for color inspiration with thousands of trendy hand-picked color palettes.

resources.title: Color Oracle
resources.description: Color Oracle is a free color blindness simulator for Windows, Mac and Linux.

resources.title: Colorable
resources.description: Contrast is the difference in luminance or color that makes an object distinguishable.

resources.title: ColorBox
resources.description: Advanced color palette generator from Lyft Design. Create multi-step color systems with custom interpolation and accessibility features built-in.

resources.title: Colordot
resources.description: Intuitive color picker that lets you create palettes by swiping through hues. Simple, gesture-based interface for quick color selection.

resources.title: Colors
resources.description: Mix and match these color classes to create a variety of accessible themes.

resources.title: Colorsinspo
resources.description: Thousands of beautiful color palettes you can use it directly by one click.

resources.title: Colourco
resources.description: Interactive HSL color picker with real-time adjustments. Fine-tune hue, saturation, and lightness values with intuitive sliders and visual feedback.

resources.title: Coolors
resources.description: Lightning-fast color palette generator with AI assistance. Create, explore, and export beautiful color schemes with keyboard shortcuts and advanced tools.

resources.title: Duo
resources.description: Duo is a collection of colour combinations that I've curated from personal projects or that I've come across on the web.

resources.title: Flat UI Color Picker
resources.description: Curated collection of 199 flat design colors with instant copy-paste functionality. Perfect for modern, minimalist UI designs with ready-to-use hex codes.

resources.title: Happy Hues
resources.description: See color palettes in context with real UI examples. Visualize how different color combinations work in actual website layouts before committing.

resources.title: Hex Colors
resources.description: A collection of free color tools that will help you choose the right color for your next project!

resources.title: HTML Color Codes
resources.description: Get HTML color codes, Hex color codes, RGB and HSL values with our color picker...

resources.title: Leonardo
resources.description: Leonardo is a one-of-a-kind tool for creating, managing, and sharing accessible color systems for user interface design and data visualization.

resources.title: Picular
resources.description: Search for any keyword and get a curated color palette inspired by Google image results. Perfect for finding colors related to concepts, moods, or objects.

resources.title: Pigment
resources.description: Create unique color palettes with this AI-powered tool. Generate harmonious color schemes and export them in various formats for your design projects.

resources.title: Pilestone
resources.description: Test how your designs appear to people with different types of color blindness. Upload images to simulate various color vision deficiencies.

resources.title: Randoma11y
resources.description: Discover random, accessible color combinations that meet WCAG accessibility standards. Get inspired with color pairs that are both beautiful and usable.

resources.title: Tint & Shade Generator
resources.description: Produce tints and shades of a given hex color in 10% increments.

resources.title: UI Colors
resources.description: Generate complete color scales from a single hex color. Perfect for creating consistent color systems for Tailwind CSS and design systems.
